summary: State and the U.S. Agency for International Development have committed to advancing diversity, equity, inclusion, and accessibility at home and abroad. This statement for the record summarizes our findings on such efforts. State implemented our prior recommendation by taking steps to identify barriers to diversity in its workforce. But, State's methods for doing so may leave some barriers unaddressed—so we recommended improving them. State and...
title: State and USAID: Efforts to Advance Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Accessibility
